p: Ascorbate helps reduce inflammation by limiting expression of pro-inflammatory cytokines, reducing CRP in individuals with CRP >1.0 mg/l ( 149); it scavenges ROS and reduces the oxidative stress on mitochondria ( 150), improves intracellular pH via decreasing lactate ( 151), decreases cell apoptosis and tissue necrosis also by inhibiting HIF-1Î± ( 152), which is stimulated by IFN-I ( 80); hypoxia by inhibiting arginine intracellular synthesis is a deleterious factor for tissue regeneration.
